description: Hi I'm a Student in Embedded Systems. I'm enjoy creating unique and simplistic electronics systems with AI in creative ways.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about solving problems in new creative ways to drive innovation. Proficient in C, C++, C# and Python I bring a strong educational background in software and embedded systems development. By leveraging my Embedded Systems and Software Developer experience I continually look for new and better ways to make tech accessible by all.
